attributes.action: support people who are ill and disabled agaisnt unfair decisions for the benifit personal independence payment
attributes.additional_details: to make sure the department of work and pension adires to the regulations, that the government have in place, for people to receive the correct benefit, as it is apparent they don't even look at medical evidence, that they are presented with. The decision makers need to be investigated. People that should get personal independence payment don't even get it. Despite medical information been given, e.g safety should be considered, effects of medication etc.
